metadata.reset:
1. Log into the Partner Portal at https://alarmadmin.alarm.com/default.aspx and select a customer.
2. Navigate to the 'Equipment' page.
3. Click the 'Z-Wave Devices' tab.
4. Under the 'Advanced Z-Wave Commands' header, click 'Remove All Z-Wave Devices.'
5. Allow 3 minutes for the associated commands to go through and for the device to act on them.
